title: Steven Pinker, Teachers Pets, Therapeutic Touch, Masters or Doctorate
description:
Dr. Kirk Honda talks about Steven Pinker, teachers' pets, therapeutic touch, and whether or not you should get a master's or doctorate.

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.
July 12, 2019.
Email: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com/contact
Access archive at: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com
Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle
Music by Bread Knife Incident.
